# b2b-required-separator

## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                                                         | Type     | Default         |
| -------- | --------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------- | --------------- |
| `label`  | `label`   | The required label. Per default it is the german 'Pflichtfeld', but can be altered. | `string` | `'Pflichtfeld'` |
